title: Pat Cash tennis my way
brief_description: Pat Cash and his coach Ian Barclay look at aspects of the game of tennis. Features special slow motion and still sequences to help study Pat’s technique. Also covers highlights from Grand Slam, Wimbledon and Davis Cup matches.
